LOL!!! 2 funny Frank! 
   
  Jeff...others...As you guys know Frank Sumption is never gonna say yes send me anything...if you wanna do somethin nice for Frank you pretty much DONT ASK just DO it hehehe.He wont take money for his hard efforts nor his out of pocket expenses and if you ask him does he want a gift the answers always gonna be "no dont waste money on me" type thing...So if you guys want him to try something out or send him somethin nice just look him up, and mail it without askin him or givin him the chance to say no
   
  <<<runs to hide from Frank now cuz he is prolly gonna kill me for this LOL>>>
   
  

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
           It's not that they don't have any, don't know. I spent close to $100 in Radio Shack the day before we had to do the Christmas shopping. I think if I go near a RS and the Ol' Lady catches me, I'll speaking with a much higher voice!
 
 Really, I have plenty of stuff to play with at the moment, I don't need yet another project. 
 
 Frank-S
